<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Client Info"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/.well-known/clients/{clientLabel}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get public information about a client based on a human readable label.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"clientLabel","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"A human readable label that uniquely identifies the client."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Public information about the client.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"issuer":{"type":"string","description":"The IDP the client uses to authenticate its developers."}},"required":["issuer"]}}}},"404":{"description":"Resource not found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error_message":{"type":"string","default":"Document not found"}},"required":["error_message"]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
